title: OPEC+ hikes oil production by more than expected following outbreak of Iran war
summary_full: This might not be enough to prevent the Iran conflict from causing a spike in oil prices when trading opens on Monday
summary_public: This might not be enough to prevent the Iran conflict from causing a spike in oil prices when trading opens on Monday

IR.label: negative
